instructions:
**Wrath & Glory (with Advanced API Integration) v3.0**

The W&G API sheet is for the revised edition of Wrath & Glory.  The previous version of this sheet supports the original edition.  This is a multi-purpose sheet for both characters (default view) and threats based on the core rules.  **Dice Rolling**

This Wrath & Glory character sheet provides automated dice rolls using the Roll20 Inline dice rolling and integration with a Wrath and Glory API Dice Roller. If you have any questions, comments, or feedback (all welcome) please contact Barry at btsnyder@gmail.com or MrBS on Roll20.
